items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

items.content_html: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.

items.content_html: The Tode Client application is a lightweight, React-based frontend designed to visualize the dependency structure of a Node.js project.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
